Articles.Content:
All,

I have just installed planetshine (from curse web site).  When I am starting KSP it is telling me that it doesn't support this version of planetshine.

Does anybody had the same issue? 

If yes have managed to solve this?

Thanks in advance for your answer.
Mine says its unsupported however it still works so I ignore it! Ksp 1.1.3

Search your game data folder for any file named MiniAVC.dll and delete all copies.

Honestly, I don't know why developers use that thing if they do not plan to update for every version.

Edited September 4, 2016 by Alshain

I have removed the Miniavc.dll and the error message is gone.

Thanks for that!
